transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you in your emergency?
Hi, I need urgent help. I am experiencing severe chest pain.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Michael Walsh and I was born on August 22, 1956.
Thank you, Michael Walsh. I've located your records. Let me assist you immediately.
Please stay calm. I am arranging an ambulance for your severe chest pain. Is there someone with you?
Good. Ensure they keep you comfortable. The ambulance will arrive shortly. Please stay on the line for any updates.
